评论详情: Wore at graduation and a school banquet. Super cute and respectable length!

I bought this for a summer wedding and it was perfect.  I am large chested and it was perfect.  Off the shoulder or on it is really great.  The bow in the back can easily be tied around your bra (youtube video) so no worries about it showing.  I ordered my normal size and it fit perfect.  It is fun and flirty.
This dress is amazing with its full coverage all around. It fits true to size, and has the cutest colors to choose from. The material is very high quality and is amazing for any occasion.

评论概述: Great dress for special events, sleeves a bit snug
评论详情: I got this as a graduation dress since my school’s color was red. The color was so rich and bright! It fit just right and was super cute, but the elastic on the sleeves was a bit too snug. It dug into my arms as I wore it and I often had to adjust it to alleviate pressure. The material is light and thin, so I’d recommend a coverup if you’re wearing this in a colder environment. For a special one-off event, it worked just right.
Accurate sizing, looks as in picture. For the price super cute, casual dress.

The quality very good and it’s breathable and light! I got a size medium and it fits perfectly, I am 5’7 and 130 pounds. This dress is perfect for taking pictures, going to church, or even just going out to eat!
The dress pictured is not the dress I got. It’s for family photos and it’s not a great quality or made the same. I am so bummed because the photographed dress is so pretty!

Would not purchase again and will be donating!

Our daughter wore this dress for her senior pictures! Absolutely stunning!! Very classy, but not old looking.

I purchased this dress in navy for a wedding in September. For reference, I am 5 ft and 146 lbs, and I ordered a L. It fits so comfortably and looks adorable. Though my bust is 43 in, I don’t need to wear a bra. The only drawback is that it’s really long on me- right past my knees. This makes it look slightly frumpy on me (I plan to compensate with some cute heels and jewelry though). I know that’s because I’m shorter than most people who would order it. It’s lovely and the price was just right!

The dress is very light weight but it is a sheer dress and not opaque like the picture sadly. I got the light pink one and it was almost a neon pastel kind of color. Very disappointed as this was going to be my baby shower dress. :( Giving it 2 stars because it came so fast.

评论详情: I have a hard time finding clothes.  Especially dressed. I'm 5'2 185lbs. Normally wear only dresses . I'm a 37 waist  and 45 hips and 41 bust. So I ride the very fine line between a large and extra large in most everything.  One is too big and the other too small. My torso is very very short which is what makes things so difficult. This dress hides my back rolls perfectly and is the ONLY thing I'm able to get away with wearing WITHOUT A BRA!! I LOVE IT. The double layer perfectly held my ladies while adding a layer to hide my nipples. Lol. Very versatile and the material is perfect for warm weather. Can't say enough about this dress.
